title: ISic020446. ISic020446
body:
Facsimile Images

Ἀρχετ̣ί̣ο̄ εἰμί το͂ Εὐκέος   ←

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena 1989 (IGASM I). ; Heldring reads ΑΡΧ[..]Ο and suggests Ἀρχέλαος or Ἀρχέβιος.

English translation

I am (the lekanis) of Archetios (son) of Eukleos.

Italian translation

Sono (la lekanis) di Archetios (figlio) di Eukleos.

commentary

Inscription of possession in which the owner's name is, according to Arena (1989), an hypocoristic from Ἀρχέτιμος, such as Ἀρχετίων, Ἄρχετος, etc. Εὐκ<λ>έος stands for Εὐκ<λ>ε͂ς with the loss of lambda in the κλ nexus.

bibliography

    Arena 1989 58 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000638 Heldring 1979 29-33 (ph) https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001443 Ferri 1968 267-268, figs.7-8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002573
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
